about_the_game:
The original 'Ostranauts' soundtrack, composed by Josh Culler (a.k.a. Invisible Acropolis). This DLC will receive updates as new tracks are added to the game, and currently includes:

All 26 Tracks from Ostranauts

The original tracks composed for the game, provided in MP3 and FLAC formats.
  • The Sky Kings
  • The Metal Barge
  • Panoramic
  • Echoes of He3
  • Fool's Gold
  • Dustball Sunrise
  • Black Glass
  • Trinity
  • The Dragon Son
  • Home
  • Broken Stream
  • Among Giants
  • The Shredder
  • Passing the Belltower
  • Imperfect Memory
  • Somewhere in the System
  • Siren's Call
  • Revelations
  • Power On Sequence
  • Signal Confirmed
  • Ladder Logic
  • Deadline
  • Bulkhead
  • Scope Check
  • Into the Black
  • Bootstrap

9 Bonus Tracks

Josh also composed some new tracks a couple years hence, and reworked them into these bonus tracks (MP3).
  • Cascade Overflow
  • Equation Simplex
  • Galaxiespur
  • Involution Protocol
  • Oort Cloud Harvest
  • Vestigial Assemblage
  • Wave V Form
  • Yard of the Derelicts
  • Yùxiān

Josh's earlier work includes the atmosphere-setting soundtracks composed for NEO Scavenger (2014) and Underrail (2015).

name: Ostranauts Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 750 MB available space

short_description: The original 'Ostranauts' soundtrack, plus an album of bonus tracks, composed by Josh Culler (a.k.a. Invisible Acropolis).
